name: pwgen
description: Pwgen is a self-hosted tool for generating secure passwords and managing custom wordlists and templates. It offers a minimal web interface for quick password creation.
features: Password generation: Create strong, random passwords with customizable length and character sets.
Custom templates: Define password templates with specific patterns and requirements.
Wordlist support: Generate memorable passphrases using custom or built-in wordlists.
Strength indicators: Evaluate password strength with visual indicators and entropy calculations.
Batch generation: Create multiple passwords simultaneously for bulk provisioning.
Character options: Include or exclude uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
Pronounceable passwords: Generate passwords that are easier to remember while maintaining security.
Web interface: Access password generation through a simple, minimal web interface.
API access: Programmatically generate passwords for integration with other systems.
Copy to clipboard: Quickly copy generated passwords with one-click functionality.
No storage: Passwords are generated on-demand without storing or logging any data.
Customizable rules: Set minimum requirements for character types and password complexity.
